verbose_text: Dbf4 levels decrease over the course of S-phase and, starting at the metaphase / anaphase transition, Dbf4 is actively degraded by the anaphase promoting complex (APC) and its activating co-factor, Cdc20 [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Dbf4 is actively degraded by the anaphase promoting complex (APC
